notes.p: The Database uses DataMapper, a Ruby ORM, and the sqlite3 database by default.

slide.title: ORM
slide.code:
require 'ronin/model'
class Person
include Ronin::Model
property :id, Serial property :name, String property :age, Integer
end

notes.p: ORM stands for Object Relational Mapper, meaning that we can define our models as Classes, and rows in the database become Objects.
A major benefit of using an ORM, is that there is no SQL needed. Create and query records all from the comfort of Ruby.
